name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and modern frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Proven ability to design and implement high-quality user interfaces while ensuring responsive design through **Tailwind** and **Bootstrap**. Adept in creating intuitive and engaging UI/UX solutions aligned with best practices, utilizing tools like **Figma**. 
Proficient in building and consuming **REST APIs**, and managing version control with **Git**. Experienced in optimizing web applications for maximum SEO performance and employing **WooCommerce** for eCommerce solutions. 
Additionally, I hold strong expertise in backend technologies such as **Python** and **Node.js**, and a solid understanding of CI/CD pipelines, enhancing overall development efficiency. Passionate about leveraging my extensive background to deliver exceptional frontend experiences.
